title: Cleansing from Skin Diseases and Mildew
summary: Leviticus 14 provides the rituals for cleansing a person healed from a skin disease, including offerings and washing. It also gives procedures for cleansing houses contaminated with mildew.

faq.question: What was required for someone healed of a skin disease?
faq.answer: They had to be examined by a priest, make offerings, and go through a purification process.

faq.question: How were houses cleansed from mildew?
faq.answer: Stones and materials were removed, and if mildew returned, the house was destroyed.
